```{r}
    library(tidycensus)
    trial<-function(nvar1='AGEP',nvar2=NULL,nvar3=NULL, nvar4=NULL, 
                    nvar5=NULL, nvar6=NULL,yr='2022', cvar1='SEX', 
                    cvar2=NULL, cvar3=NULL, cvar4=NULL, cvar5=NULL, 
                    cvar6=NULL,cvar7=NULL,cvar8=NULL,cvar9=NULL)
      {
              ends <- get_pums(variables = c(nvar1, nvar2, nvar3, nvar4, 
                                             nvar5, nvar6, cvar1, cvar2, 
                                             cvar3, cvar4, cvar5, cvar6, 
                                             cvar7, cvar8, cvar9),
                               survey = "acs1",
                               state = 'NC',
                               year = if (yr <= 2023 & yr >=2010){yr}
                              )
              return(ends)
      }

    x<-trial()
```
